name: Marilena_Pet-and-Ella_Alda_Mattea
content:
Marilena Pet-and-Ella Alda Mattea was the human commander of Freemarch, a rebel movement operating at the astronomical object Lorrd in the Corporate Sector. Between 5 BBY and 4 BBY, Mattea was featured in a report sent from General Davits Draven to Senator Mon Mothma, both leading members of a rebel network against the Galactic Empire. The report detailed major resistance movements against the Empire which were active in the latter faction's territories. The report later became part of an archive of non-electric documents known as The Rebel Files, compiled by archivist Hendri Underholt by the year 4 ABY. Mattea had brown hair, blue eyes, and light-colored skin. In the profile, Mattea wore a brown shirt with a yellow collar and a brown bandolier.
Marilena Pet-and-Ella Alda Mattea was mentioned in the 2017 reference book and boxed set Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace. Adri√°n Rodriguez was responsible for drawing the illustrations on the page where Mattea is featured.
